page.title: 03AMENITIES FORRES WEST
page.content: In Forres there are roughly eight hotels some are big with lots of rooms like the Royal Hotel The Ramnee and the Park.One hotel the Queens Hotel will be demolished to make way for another building.They are also planning on clearing the scrapyard and building a Fine Fare supermarket which will mean plenty of jobs for teenagers when they come out of school colleges etc. Forres is famous for its gardens and it has won the Britain in Bloom a few times.The most beautiful of the sights must be the sunken gardens with its deep well and fountains with flowers surrounding it and there are seats on which you can sit and admire the view of the gardens.Next to the gardens there is the Grant Park its massive.So next time you are on holiday come to Forres, we guarantee you will have a great time.
